I was looking for a feature stream to put this, non found, however, design stream look more close.
So anyone having any thoughts to have a highlight text feature @Tim Abbott @Rishi Gupta
@Aniket G Meshram By highlight text you mean something like alert words? https://chat.zulip.org/#settings/alert-words

By highlight I mean sending a message with some word(s) highlighted. Alert-words I think is different than what I'm suggesting.
What I mean by highlight-text is lets say I write some text, and I bold some text by using asterisk, so I may lets say want to highlight the text as well, Or make it italic. Now making the text bold and italic, we already have that. In addition we may have this highlight text feature as well. Again For example like this:
